markdownRemark.html:
Welcome to my blog where I will ramble about web dev, video games, and anime.

Will anyone read this? Who knows? Maybe this’ll be a good place to catalog my thoughts and see how they change over time. Considering how quickly the web moves, this could be very embarrassing, but it’s a good time capsule. What I thought was best practice in 2018 wasn’t the same in 2019, and it certainly won’t be the same in 2020.
